events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund for the order.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's reported concern about returning the product.
The refund request case was assigned to a customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your order. I’m here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund faster, could you also confirm if the product has been opened or used in any way?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket hasn’t been worn; I just tried it on once and it’s still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately once you return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will send you.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick help and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The prepaid shipping label has been emailed to you. Please send back the jacket within 7 days to complete the refund process.
Checking in to ensure you received the shipping label and to see if you need any further assistance with your return.
Yes, I received the label and have already dropped off the jacket at the post office yesterday.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our short satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
